Hello,
I was told to write a processor in heritrix so that it
should take url and string as input and process the
crawling if page contains the given string then that
link should be written to mysql.Can anybody help me in
this regard?

I am new to java. I donn't khow where to modify the
heritrix code and configure the same in heritrix.

I don't want to store the content .i just want to
store the matched link.



Thanks in advance
Sudhindra Joshi
